The Craftsman

Lot 6

Experience the Ultimate Southern California Lifestyle!  Malibu Valley Estates is presented by Master Developer Malibu Valley Partners.

This exclusive enclave of 26 homesites is generously situated on over 100 acres allowing each custom family estate privacy, elegance and unobstructed panoramic views of the Santa Monica Mountains.

“The Craftsman” is perched atop one of the most elevated homesites in this gated community and will be ready for occupancy in Spring, 2021.  This 6,400SF masterpiece boasts a soaring curved staircase and showcases a resort-style infinity pool and spa with outside shower and bathroom/changing room.

Finally, a home that has it all: impeccably designed floorplan with paramount finishes, featuring 5 large bedroom suites, plus an additional office/media room.  The master suite reveals breathtaking views, a makeup vanity filled with natural light, separate sinks and Toto washlets, accompanied by a soaking tub and oversized shower with dual shower heads.

Enjoy the incredible sunset views from the home’s expansive balconies and porches, along with the ambiance of its outdoor natural gas lanterns and fireplaces.

The kitchen is exquisitely crafted with high-end Gaggenau appliances, including a plumbed coffee machine.

There is also an 18’ wide bifold glass wall system for seamless indoor/outdoor living and dining atop one of the area’s most expansive views.

This well thought out home has direct access to the pantry from its 4-car garage, as well as family and laundry rooms on each floor.

The Craftsman is a smart home with wireless Crestron system allowing automated control from anywhere at anytime with the touch of a button or smart phone.

It’s also privately gated with a 160ft driveway that sits on 2.3 acres overlooking the historic King Gillette Ranch and Malibu Creek State Park, which encompass 9,000 combined acres for hiking, mountain biking and horseback riding.

All essentials, the region’s highest rated public and private schools, Malibu’s world class beaches, and a private equestrian path leading to a renowned equestrian center are in close proximity to Malibu Valley Estates.  The Craftsman is a compound getaway for a family to enjoy and thrive where they live, work and play.
